workflow.name: Automate Gmail responses with GPT and human-in-the-loop verification
workflow.description:
## Try It Out!
This n8n template uses AI to automatically respond to your Gmail inbox by drafting response for your approval via email.

### How it works
* **Gmail Trigger** monitors your inbox for new emails
* **AI Analysis** determines if a response is needed based on your criteria
* **Draft Generation** creates contextually appropriate replies using your business information
* **Human Approval** sends you the draft for review before sending
* **Auto-Send** replies automatically once approved

### Setup
1. Connect your Gmail account to the Gmail Trigger node
2. Update the "Your Information" node with:
   * Entity name and description
   * Approval email address
   * Resource guide (FAQs, policies, key info)
   * Response guidelines (tone, style, formatting preferences)
3. Configure your LLM provider (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, etc.) with API credentials
4. Test with a sample email

### Requirements
* n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud)
* Gmail account with API access
* LLM provider API key

### Need Help?
Email Nick @ nick@tropicflare.com

workflow.name: Email Auto Responder with AI (With Human Verification)

parameters.message:

Nick Canfield
CEO, Global Hola

+1 (760) 383-1863  |  nick.canfield@globalhola.com

www.globalhola.com  

IMPORTANT: This email and any attachments may contain confidential or privileged information intended solely for the addressee. Unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.

We handle all personal and sensitive data in accordance with GDPR, SOC 2, and HIPAA standards. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender immediately and permanently delete this message.

By communicating with us via email, you acknowledge that you understand and accept the inherent risks of electronic communication. Our organization employs technical and organizational measures to safeguard your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

=Do you approve the reply?

Sender: {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.to.value[0].name }} ({{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.to.value[0].address }})

-------------
Reply to Approve:
{{ $json.cleaned }}
parameters.subject: =Review & Approve Reply: {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.headers.subject }}

parameters.content:
#### Your Information
Please edit the business information step below to give the LLM context on how to respond.

## Select Your LLM
The default here is ChatGPT for determining if the email needs a reply.

#### Connect Your Gmail Account
Please connect your Gmail account.
#### Please Update With Your Gmail Account

## Determines if Email Needs a Response & Drafts Response
The default here is ChatGPT for determining if the email needs a reply.
## Asks You For Approval to Reply
## Each new email in your inbox triggers the workflow

## Try It Out!
This n8n template uses AI to automatically respond to your Gmail inbox by drafting response for your approval via email.

### How it works
* **Gmail Trigger** monitors your inbox for new emails
* **AI Analysis** determines if a response is needed based on your criteria
* **Draft Generation** creates contextually appropriate replies using your business information
* **Human Approval** sends you the draft for review before sending
* **Auto-Send** replies automatically once approved

### Setup
1. Connect your Gmail account to the Gmail Trigger node
2. Update the "Your Information" node with:
   * Entity name and description
   * Approval email address
   * Resource guide (FAQs, policies, key info)
   * Response guidelines (tone, style, formatting preferences)
3. Configure your LLM provider (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, etc.) with API credentials
4. Test with a sample email

### Requirements
* n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud)
* Gmail account with API access
* LLM provider API key

### Need Help?
Email Nick @ nick@tropicflare.com

assignments.name: entity_description
assignments.value: My business builds custom workflow automations in n8n

assignments.name: information_resource_guide
assignments.value:
Resource Guide.
--------------------------------
üßæ Tropic Flare ‚Äî Lead FAQ Resource Doc

What is Tropic Flare Solutions?
Tropic Flare Solutions provides expert tech and IT consulting, specializing in business automation to help companies streamline operations and achieve growth. We bring a unique outside perspective and a refreshing take to all our projects, from building low-code tools to automate your business to assessing roadblocks draining your energy and sales.

‚è≥ Turnaround Time
- Discovery calls are typically scheduled within 2-3 business days.
- Simple automation projects: 1-2 weeks from discovery to implementation.
- Complex low-code tool development: 2-4 weeks depending on scope.
- Website development: 3-6 weeks for custom WordPress sites.

üõ†Ô∏è Our Services

**Business Automation**
Say goodbye to manual tasks and hello to efficiency. We automate repetitive processes using tools like Zapier, Make, n8n, and custom coding - freeing up valuable time and resources so you can focus on what truly matters: growing your business.

**Low-Code Tool Development**
Is your team still passing along versioned Excel files for your processes and reports? We create solutions using low-code tools (Retool, Glide Apps, Flutter Flow, and Google Sheets) to keep your business processes and teams aligned. We're a Retool Certified Agency Partner!

**Data ETL & Dashboards**
Need actionable insights from your data? We join and combine your data from multiple sources to develop data pipelines (ETL) and dashboards (using DOMO and other tools) for your teams to gain valuable business insights.

**Website Development**
We specialize in creating bespoke WordPress websites that not only impress but also engage your audience effectively. From custom design to e-commerce solutions, CMS implementation, and SEO optimization - we build dazzling websites that bring more business and excite your customers.

**Small Business Consulting**
Need a fresh set of eyes to bring life to your sales or operations? We bring bright small business solutions to unclog your business pipes and help your business run more efficiently.

üí≤ Pricing
- **Consultation Hours**: Purchase consultation hours for ad-hoc projects and advice.
- **Free Discovery Call**: Book a free 15-minute intro consultation or in-depth discovery call to discuss your project.
- **WordPress Autoblogging Service**:
  - Basic Plan: $7/month - One SEO-optimized blog post per day (800-1,000 words, draft mode)
  - Premium Plan: $12/month - Two SEO-optimized blog posts per day (1,000-1,200 words, with autolinking and featured images)
- **Custom Project Pricing**: All automation, low-code tool development, data, and website projects are quoted based on scope and requirements after discovery call.
- We pride ourselves on being "timely, consistent, and competitively priced."

üè¢ Industries Served
We work with businesses across many industries including:
- Recruiting and HR companies
- Marketing agencies and PR firms
- E-commerce businesses
- Non-profit organizations
- Professional services
- Engineering and technical companies
- Any business looking to streamline operations through automation

If your business has repetitive processes or needs custom tools, Tropic Flare can help.

üîß Tools & Technologies We Use
- **Automation Platforms**: Zapier, Make, n8n, Pabbly Connect, Active Pieces
- **Low-Code Development**: Retool (Certified Partner), Glide Apps, Flutter Flow
- **Data & Analytics**: DOMO, Google Sheets, custom data pipelines
- **Website Development**: WordPress, custom CMS solutions
- **Programming**: Custom coding when needed for specialized solutions
- **Integrations**: We connect all your existing tools and systems

üìÖ How We Work
- **Discovery Phase**: We schedule a free discovery call to understand your business, processes, and pain points.
- **Solution Design**: We propose tailored automation or tool solutions that fit your specific needs.
- **Implementation**: Our team builds, tests, and deploys your solution with transparency and communication every step of the way.
- **Training & Handoff**: We ensure your team understands how to use and maintain the solution.
- **Ongoing Support**: Our commitment doesn't end with implementation - we provide ongoing support and maintenance to ensure continued success.

üíº Our Approach & Values
- **Results-Driven**: We focus on creating wide-reaching returns on investment (Goal: 10X ROI).
- **Process-Oriented**: All work is data-driven and focused on continuous process improvements.
- **Collaborative**: We work closely with your team every step of the way, ensuring transparency, communication, and alignment.
- **Technology-Agnostic**: We recommend the best tools for your needs, from Zapier to custom solutions.
- **Quality-Focused**: We deliver high-quality, tailored solutions that save time, reduce costs, and enhance productivity.

‚úÖ Why Choose Tropic Flare
- Retool Certified Agency Partner
- Expert in multiple automation platforms (Zapier, Make, n8n)
- Proven track record with recruiting, marketing, engineering, and e-commerce clients
- Comprehensive services: automation, low-code tools, data dashboards, and websites
- Competitive pricing and commitment to ROI
- Personalized approach to every project
- Ongoing support and maintenance available

üéØ Common Solutions We Provide
- Candidate-tracking applications integrated with data sources
- Automated data pipelines and DOMO dashboards
- CRM and deal tracking mechanisms
- Onboarding automation systems
- Marketing automation and KPI tracking
- DIAdem engineering software automation
- Google Business Profile automation
- Custom WordPress solutions with branding

üìû Getting Started
1. **Book a Free Discovery Call** - Let's go in-depth into what your business is trying to accomplish.
2. **Purchase Consultation Hours** - For immediate project kickoff or ongoing advisory.
3. **Review Our Templates & Tools** - Check out our free and paid automation templates.

Visit tropicflare.com or contact us to streamline your operations and achieve growth through automation!

assignments.name: response_guidelines
assignments.value:
- Always be friendly.
- Please format your response in HTML.
- Don't include any additional information. Only the HTML response please. Don't include any /n or any additional text that isn't HTML format.
- Don't include an email signature.
- Don't use emojis.
- Use lists to break up the content into easy to read sections.
- DON'T include the \n line break text in your response.
- DON'T use "‚Äî" in your email or any typical things that AI use.

parameters.content: #### Please Update With Your Gmail Account

user.name: Nick Canfield
user.bio: Automation and change management consultant with over 10 years helping businesses perform better.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
